page.title: 20CREDITS.
page.content: We would like to thank all those who gave us help in any way whatsoever for our Domesday project. First, our thanks to Lady Rusby of Ochiltree Castle who showed us around her lovely home. To Mrs Aitken and Mr Taylor for giving us some of their precious time for interviews.Also to Mr John Biggar for the information he gave us on orienteering. To Alec Cargill,Jim McLeod, Eric Dickson and their helpers, who were always ready to answer questions we had prepared. Our thanks must be given to Mr Welsh our headmaster, who has helped us with the photographs.He was always willing to take us round to our "boxes" in the mini-bus. Last,but not least, our thanks to the B.B.C.for a most interesting project.
